Body:
dir_path = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', '3_0', 'McMurdo')
con = cb.Contribution(dir_path)
status, outfiles, image_recs = ipmag.aniso_magic(iboot=1, ihext=0, ivec=1,
    ipar=1, vec=2, Dir=[0, 90], save_plots=True, isite=False, contribution=
    con, image_records=True)
self.assertTrue(status)
for fname in outfiles:
    self.assertTrue(os.path.exists(fname))
files = glob.glob('*.png')
self.assertEqual(6, len(files))
self.assertTrue(image_recs)
self.assertEqual(6, len(image_recs))
